headline: PPG donates digital refinish tools to 15 vocational schools across Europe
summary: ROLLE, Switzerland, December 17, 2024--PPG has donated the PPG LINQ digital refinish ecosystem to 15 European vocational schools as part of a commitment to invest in workforce development.
